titlestmt.titleproper: Seventh Day Adventist Church Of Hood River Plans 1945-1946.
Seventh Day Adventist Church Of Hood River Plans

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.unittitle: Seventh Day Adventist Church of Hood River plans
did.abstract: Collection includes: 5 plans and elevations on 10 sheets of the Seventh Day Adventist Church in Hood River, Oregon, scale: 1/4" : 1', 1945-1946. Ernst Kroner (1866-1955) was a German-born architect who came to Portland, Oregon in 1889.

bioghist.p: Ernst Kroner (1866-1955) was a German-born architect who came to Portland, Oregon in 1889.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: 5 plans and elevations on 10 sheets of the Seventh Day Adventist Church in Hood River, Oregon, scale: 1/4" : 1', 1945-1946.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Seventh Day Adventist Church of Hood River Plans, Mss 3080, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

bibliography.p: Forms part of the Ernst Kroner Architectural Papers.
